task.title: Creating and Posting a Cash Sale Receipt
task.abstract: Adding a Sales Order Line to the Sales Order will link each product and service offered to an Item in the eStore.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order tab in the eBusiness app and click New.
Select the Account or Contact using the lookup.
Select Receipt as the Posting Entity and Simple Receipt as the Schedule Type. Click Save.
Click the New Sales Order Line button on the Sales Order Lines related list.
Select the Item using the lookup and enter the Quantity. Click Save.
step.info: Enable the Price Override checkbox if a price less than the item's List Price is to be applied. If no Price Rule is linked to the Sales Order, manually enter the discount Sales Price through:
In the Community Portal, the checkout modal displays a strikethrough on the item's original list price and features the Your Price default label and the related sales price.

taskbody.result: The receipt is created, but not yet posted.

ol.li: Navigate to the Sales Order record to review and, if necessary, amend the receipt.
Select Closed from the Status picklist and click Save.

Enter the payment information and click the Pay button.If no Payment Gateway is selected, an error message is returned.
Navigate to the Receipts related list and click on the newly created receipt to view further transaction details, such as Receipt Lines. The related journal entries are entered into the GL and displayed on the Sales Order record.
